2 #include "library/ROSNode.h"
3 // Keep only the headers needed
4 #include "ros/ros.h"
5 #include <geometry_msgs/PoseWithCovarianceStamped.h>
6 ROSNode::ROSNode(ros::NodeHandle nh) : nh_(nh){
7  odom = nh_.subscribe("/odom", 1, &ROSNode::odomCallBack, this);
8  laser_scan = nh_.subscribe("/scan", 1, &ROSNode::laserScanCallBack, this);
9  camera = nh_.subscribe("/camera/rgb/image_raw", 1, &ROSNode::cameraCallBack, this);
10  camera_depth = nh_.subscribe("/camera/depth/points", 1, &ROSNode::pointCloudCallBack, this);
11  pub_vel = nh_.advertise<geometry_msgs::Twist>("/cmd_vel", 3, false);
12  pub_goal = nh_.advertise<geometry_msgs::PoseStamped>("/move_base_simple/goal", 3, false);
13 
14 
15  // std::this_thread::sleep_for(std::chrono::seconds(5));
16  // pub_goal = nh_.advertise<geometry_msgs::PoseStamped>("/move_base_simple/goal", 3, false);
17 
18  initialPosePublisher = nh_.advertise<geometry_msgs::PoseWithCovarianceStamped>("/initialpose", 1);
19 
20  thread_ = std::thread(&ROSNode::simulate, this);
21  thread_.detach();
22  startNode = false;
23 
24  // camera = nh_.subscribe("/camera/rgb/image_raw", 1000, &ROSNode::cameraCallBack, this);
25  // lidarSensor = nh_.subscribe("/sensor", 1000, &ROSNode::lidarCallBack, this);
26  // pub_vel = nh_.advertise<std_msgs::Float64>("/cmd_vel", 3, false);
27 }
28 void ROSNode::setUpInitialPose(nav_msgs::Odometry odom){
29  geometry_msgs::PoseWithCovarianceStamped initialPose;
30  // Set the frame_id and timestamp.
31  // Ensure that the frame_id matches your robot's configuration.
32  initialPose.header.frame_id = "map";
33  initialPose.header.stamp = ros::Time::now();
34 
35  // Set the pose data. You may want to adjust or convert these based on your needs.
36  initialPose.pose.pose.position.x = odom.pose.pose.position.x;
37  initialPose.pose.pose.position.y = odom.pose.pose.position.y;
38  initialPose.pose.pose.orientation = odom.pose.pose.orientation;
39 
40  // Set covariance if needed, here copied directly from Odometry
41  initialPose.pose.covariance = odom.pose.covariance;
42 
43  // Publish the initial pose
44  initialPosePublisher.publish(initialPose);
45 }

79 void ROSNode::odomCallBack(const nav_msgs::OdometryConstPtr &msg)
80 {
81  robotMtx_.lock();
82  bot_odom = *msg;
83  if (!startNode) {
84  startNode = true;
85  setUpInitialPose(bot_odom);
86  }
87  robotMtx_.unlock();
88 }

90 void ROSNode::laserScanCallBack(const sensor_msgs::LaserScanConstPtr &msg)
91 {
92  robotMtx_.lock();
93  bot_laser_scan = *msg;
94  robotMtx_.unlock();
95 }

98 { // Type: sensor_msgs/Image
99  robotMtx_.lock();
100  image_ = *msg;
101  robotMtx_.unlock();
102 }

104 void ROSNode::pointCloudCallBack(const sensor_msgs::PointCloud2ConstPtr &msg)
105 { // Type: sensor_msgs/Image
106  robotMtx_.lock();
107  point_cloud = *msg;
108  robotMtx_.unlock();
109 }

116 std::vector<geometry_msgs::Point> ROSNode::returnLaserScan()
117 {
118  std::vector<geometry_msgs::Point> filteredLaserScan_;
119  // if (bot_laser_scan == nullptr) {
120  // std::cout << "Failed to receive scan. Attempting again." << std::endl;
121  // // return filteredLaserScan; // Return an empty vector.
122  // }
123  temp_scan = bot_laser_scan;
124  for (int i = bot_laser_scan.ranges.size() - 1; i >= 0; i--)
125  {
126  auto &scan = bot_laser_scan.ranges.at(i);
127 
128  if ((std::isfinite(scan) && scan != std::numeric_limits<double>::infinity() && scan != std::numeric_limits<double>::quiet_NaN() && scan < bot_laser_scan.range_max))
129  {
130  // delete
131  filteredLaserScan_.push_back(polarToCart(i));
132  }
133  }
134 
135  return filteredLaserScan_;
136 }

145 std::vector<geometry_msgs::Point32> ROSNode::returnPointCloud(){
146 
147  sensor_msgs::PointCloud out_pointcloud;
148  sensor_msgs::convertPointCloud2ToPointCloud(point_cloud, out_pointcloud);
149  std::vector<geometry_msgs::Point32> temp_;
150 
151  for(int i = 0 ; i < out_pointcloud.points.size(); ++i){
152  geometry_msgs::Point32 point;
153 
154  //Dooo something here
155  point.x = out_pointcloud.points[i].x;
156  point.y = out_pointcloud.points[i].y;
157  point.z = out_pointcloud.points[i].z;
158 
159  temp_.push_back(point);
160 
161  }
162  pcl_points = temp_; //Not necessary but keeps a local record
163  return temp_;
164 }
165 
166 std::vector<geometry_msgs::Point32> ROSNode::returnReducedPointCloud(){
167  std::vector<geometry_msgs::Point32> temp_;
168  temp_ = returnPointCloud();
169 
170  std::vector<geometry_msgs::Point32> filtered_temp_;
171 
172  float anglerange = 15*M_PI/180;
173 
174 
175  for(int i = 0; i < temp_.size(); ++i){
176  float distance_ = calculateDistance(temp_.at(i).x, temp_.at(i).y, temp_.at(i).z);
177  if(distance_ < 1){
178  float angle = atan2(temp_.at(i).x, temp_.at(i).y);
179 
180  if(std::abs(angle) < anglerange) {
181  filtered_temp_.push_back(temp_.at(i));
182  }
183  }
184  }
185  return filtered_temp_;
186 }

189 void ROSNode::sendCmd(double linear_x, double linear_y, double linear_z, double angular_x, double angular_y, double angular_z)
190 {
191  bot_vel.linear.x = linear_x;
192  bot_vel.linear.y = linear_y;
193  bot_vel.linear.z = linear_z;
194  bot_vel.angular.x = angular_x;
195  bot_vel.angular.y = angular_y;
196  bot_vel.angular.z = angular_z;
197  pub_vel.publish(bot_vel);
198 }
199 
200 geometry_msgs::Point ROSNode::polarToCart(unsigned int index)
201 {
202  float angle = temp_scan.angle_min + (temp_scan.angle_increment * index); // + angle_range/2;
203  float range = temp_scan.ranges.at(index);
204  geometry_msgs::Point cart;
205 
206  cart.x = static_cast<double>(range * cos(angle));
207  cart.y = static_cast<double>(range * sin(angle));
208 
209  // ROS_INFO_STREAM(cart.x);
210  // ROS_INFO_STREAM(cart.y);
211 
212  return cart;
213 }
214 
215 void ROSNode::setShelfDetectingFlag(bool flag){
216  shelf_locating_flag = flag;
217 }
218 
219 float ROSNode::calculateDistance(float x, float y, float z) {
220  float distance = std::sqrt(std::pow(x, 2) +
221  std::pow(y, 2) +
222  std::pow(z, 2));
223  return distance;
224 }
225 
226 void ROSNode::sendGoal(geometry_msgs::Pose position)
227 {
228  std::string map = "map";
229  bot_goal.header.seq++;
230  bot_goal.header.frame_id = map; // this need to change according to the rostopic echo /move_base_simple/goal
231  bot_goal.pose = position;
232  bot_goal.pose.orientation.w = 0.5;
233  pub_goal.publish(bot_goal);
234 }
